cells.data:
## Resources
Some papers to read:
Online metric learning:
- [POLA paper](http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.442.5929&rep=rep1&type=pdf) by Shai Shalev Schwartz and friends.
- [LEGO paper](http://people.bu.edu/bkulis/pubs/nips_online.pdf) by Jain and friends
- [RDML](https://www.cse.msu.edu/~rongjin/publications/nips10-dist-learn.pdf) by Jin et al.

Potentially relevant:
- [Deep Online metric learning](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1805.05510.pdf)

## RDML
### Summary
- They examine generalization of regularized distance metric learning, and found that (with appropriate constraints) the generalization error could be independent form the dimensionality (Of the input data ?).
- They introduce an efficient online metric learning algorithm
